Html:
Hi guys, sorry if this is a dumb question but while  i was following the installation guide i couldnt find any folder like this, NewtonSDK/sdk/dll, instead i found a lot of folders in this path NewtonWin-2.16\sdk\x32 which are named like dll_double_vs7,   dll_double_vs9, dll_vs7, dll_vs9, i have no idea what to do next, which one is the one i should use??

Also i couldnt find any "setup.exe" to install it :S, im kinda lost here, any help?

You need to download version 1.53, not the version 2 series. We do not officially support Newton2 yet.

Ohan
